title: TWLSaveTool
author: TuxSH
description: A 3DS homebrew that allows you to read, write, and erase save files from NDS cartridges
details:
TWLSaveTool is a 3DS homebrew that allows you to read, write, and erase save files from NDS cartridges (just like savegame-manager!)

The CIA build requires an access to CFWs. If it's the case, this is the best option; you'll be able to see the awesome banner Apache Thunder made üòâ.

The 3dsx build requires you to have either Pok√©Transporter or Pok√©mon Dream Radar installed on your 3DS. In both cases you'll need to pay to be able to download them.

Compatibility list:
All games except WarioWare D.I.Y., Band Brothers DX, Art Academy DS, and Pok√©mon Typing Adventure should be supported.
